column5: Custom neighborhood near George Bush and Central Expressway (I-75) We live on a quiet cul-de-sac with mature trees in a very safe neighborhood.  We provide a coffee pot/microwave/refrigerator upstairs while you are still welcome to use the entire kitchen. There is a living area upstairs with a couch and desk. We provide more space than most, a perfect location in a safe custom built home. Highly rated!!!  If you request an additional bedroom, additional fees may incur.
column8: Your Private Bedroom in a Custom Home!
